dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: O na...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Is everything ok?
dialogue.translation: Ydy popeth yn iawn?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: No! We've hit some kind of interference...
dialogue.translation: Na! Rydyn ni wedi taro rhyw fath o drafferth...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Something's wrong! We're going to crash!
dialogue.translation: Mae rhywbeth o'i le! Rydyn ni'n mynd i grasio!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: O na!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Everyone off the ship!
dialogue.translation: Pawb oddi ar y llong!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This shouldn't be happening!
dialogue.translation: Ni ddylai hyn digwydd!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Phew! That was scary!
dialogue.translation: Ffiw! Roedd hynny'n frawychus!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: At least we all escaped, right guys?
dialogue.translation: O leiaf fe wnaethon ni i gyd ddianc, iawn bois?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder why the ship teleported me here alone?
dialogue.translation: Tybed pam wnaeth y llong fy nheleportio i yma ar fy mhen fy hun?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope everyone else got out ok...
dialogue.translation: Gobeithio bod pawb arall wedi gadael yn iawn...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Violet! Is that you?
dialogue.translation: Violet! Ai ti yw hwnna?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Capten! Ti'n iawn!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Something has gone horribly wrong with the ship's teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Mae rhywbeth wedi mynd yn ofnadwy o'i le gyda theleporter y llong!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think everyone has been teleported away randomly! They could be anywhere!
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n meddwl bod pawb wedi cael eu teleportio i ffwrdd ar hap! Gallen nhw fod yn unrhyw le!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: O na!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm on the ship - it's damaged badly, but it's still intact!
dialogue.translation: Rydw i ar y llong - mae wedi'i difrodi'n ddrwg, ond mae'n dal yn gyfan!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Where are you, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Ble wyt ti, Capten?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I'm on some sort of space station... It seems pretty modern...
dialogue.translation: Rydw i ar ryw fath o orsaf ofod... Mae'n ymddangos yn eithaf modern ...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There seems to be some sort of interference in this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Mae'n ymddangos bod rhyw fath o ymyrraeth yn y dimensiwn hwn...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm broadcasting the coordinates of the ship to you now.
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n darlledu cyfesurynnau'r llong i ti nawr.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I can't teleport you back, but...
dialogue.translation: Ni allaf eich teleportio yn ôl, ond ...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If YOU can find a teleporter anywhere nearby, you should be able to teleport back to me!
dialogue.translation: Os gallet TI ddod o hyd i deleporter unrhyw le gerllaw, dylet ti allu teleportio yn ôl ataf!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll try to find one!
dialogue.translation: Iawn! Byddaf yn ceisio dod o hyd i un!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Good luck, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Pob lwc, Capten!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll keep trying to find the rest of the crew...
dialogue.translation: Byddaf yn parhau i geisio dod o hyd i weddill y criw...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if no trinkets found yet

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ohh! I wonder what that is?
dialogue.translation: O! Tybed beth yw hynny?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Mae'n debyg nad oes ei angen arnaf mewn gwirionedd, ond efallai y byddai'n braf mynd ag ef yn ôl i'r llong i'w astudio ...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if other trinket already found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh! It's another one of those shiny things!
dialogue.translation: O! Mae'n un arall o'r pethau sgleiniog yna!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Mae'n debyg nad oes ei angen arnaf mewn gwirionedd, ond efallai y byddai'n braf mynd ag ef yn ôl i'r llong i'w astudio ...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n teleporter!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I can get back to the ship with this!
dialogue.translation: Gallaf fynd yn ôl at y llong gyda hyn!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, Doctor - have you any idea what caused the crash?
dialogue.translation: Felly, Doctor - oes gen ti unrhyw syniad beth achosodd y ddamwain?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's some sort of bizarre signal here that's interfering with our equipment...
dialogue.translation: Mae yna ryw fath o signal rhyfedd yma sy'n ymyrryd â'n hoffer...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It caused the ship to lose its quantum position, collapsing us into this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Achosodd i'r llong golli ei safle cwantwm, gan ein disgyn i'r dimensiwn hwn!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: O na!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: But I think we should be able to fix the ship and get out of here...
dialogue.translation: Ond rwy'n credu y dylem allu trwsio'r llong a gadael fan hyn ...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... as long as we can find the rest of the crew.
dialogue.translation: ... cyn belled ag y gallwn ddod o hyd i weddill y criw.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We really don't know anything about this place...
dialogue.translation: Dydyn ni wir ddim yn gwybod unrhywbeth am y lle hwn...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Our friends could be anywhere - they could be lost, or in danger!
dialogue.translation: Gall ein ffrindiau fod yn unrhyw le - gallen nhw fod ar goll, neu mewn peryg!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Can they teleport back here?
dialogue.translation: Gallen nhw deleportio yn ôl yma?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Not unless they find some way to communicate with us!
dialogue.translation: Nid oni bai eu bod yn dod o hyd i ffordd i gyfathrebu â ni!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We can't pick up their signal and they can't teleport here unless they know where the ship is...
dialogue.translation: Ni methu pigo fyny'r signal a dydyn nhw fethu teleportio yma oni bai eu bod yn gwybod ble mae'r llong...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So what do we do?
dialogue.translation: Felly beth ydyn ni'n ei wneud?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We need to find them! Head out into the dimension and look for anywhere they might have ended up...
dialogue.translation: Mae angen i ni ddod o hyd iddyn nhw! Ewch allan i'r dimensiwn a chwiliwch am unrhyw le y gallen nhw wedi diweddu i fyny...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! Where do we start?
dialogue.translation: Iawn! Ble rydyn ni'n dechrau?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Well, I've been trying to find them with the ship's scanners!
dialogue.translation: Wel, dwi wedi bod yn trio ffeindio nhw efo sganwyr y llong!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It's not working, but I did find something...
dialogue.translation: Nid yw'n gweithio, ond fe wnes i ddod o hyd i rywbeth ...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: These points show up on our scans as having high energy patterns!
dialogue.translation: Mae'r pwyntiau hyn yn dangos ar ein sganiau fel rhai sydd â phatrymau egni uchel!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's a good chance they're teleporters - which means they're probably built near something important...
dialogue.translation: Mae siawns dda eu bod nhw'n deleporters - sy'n golygu eu bod nhw fwy na thebyg wedi'u hadeiladu ger rhywbeth pwysig...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: They could be a very good place to start looking.
dialogue.translation: Gallen nhw fod yn lle da iawn i ddechrau edrych.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll head out and see what I can find!
dialogue.translation: Iawn! Byddaf yn mynd allan i weld beth alla'i ffeindio!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Dwi yma os oes angen unrhyw help!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Dwi yma os oes angen unrhyw help!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed, Doctor.
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n teimlo dan straen, Doctor.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where do I begin?
dialogue.translation: Ble ydw i'n dechrau?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press ENTER to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Cofiwch y gallet ti wasgu ENTER i wirio ble wyt ti ar y map!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press {b_map} to check where you are on the map!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look for areas where the rest of the crew might be...
dialogue.translation: Chwiliwch am feysydd lle gallai gweddill y criw fod...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you get lost, you can get back to the ship from any teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Os wyt ti'n mynd ar goll, gallet ti fynd yn ôl i'r llong o unrhyw deleporter.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: And don't worry! We'll find everyone!
dialogue.translation: A pheidiwch â phoeni! Byddwn yn dod o hyd i bawb!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Bydd popeth yn iawn!

cutscene.explanation: only one player string is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Wyt ti'n iawn, Capten?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Victoria, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n poeni am Victoria, Doctor!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vitellary, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n poeni am Vitellary , Doctor !

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Verdigris, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n poeni am Verdigris, Doctor!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vermilion, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n poeni am Vermilion, Doctor!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about you, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n poeni amdanat ti, Doctor!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh - well, don't worry, they'll show up!
dialogue.translation: O - wel, peidiwch â phoeni, byddan nhw'n ymddangos!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Here! Have a lollipop!
dialogue.translation: Dyma ti! Cael lolipop!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store anything I find out there...
dialogue.translation: Mae hwn yn ymddangos fel lle da i storio unrhyw beth rydw i'n ei ddarganfod ...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Mae Victoria wrth ei bodd yn astudio'r pethau diddorol rydyn ni'n eu darganfod ar ein hanturiaethau!

cutscene.explanation: if at least one trinket found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store those shiny things.
dialogue.translation: Mae hwn yn ymddangos fel lle da i storio'r pethau sgleiniog hynny.

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Mae Victoria wrth ei bodd yn astudio'r pethau diddorol rydyn ni'n eu darganfod ar ein hanturiaethau!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Gobeithio ei bod hi'n iawn...

cutscene.explanation: nuance: `she's BACK on the ship` means more `she's home` and not `she has returned to the ship`. She has never left the ship

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been so worried!
dialogue.translation: Capten! Dwi wedi bod yn pryderu!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Prif Verdigris! Ti'n iawn!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I've been trying to get out, but I keep going around in circles...
dialogue.translation: Rydw i wedi ceisio gadael, ond rydw i dal i fynd o gwmpas mewn cylchoedd ...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I've come from the ship. I'm here to teleport you back to it.
dialogue.translation: Dw i wedi dod o'r llong. Rydw i yma i dy teleportio yn ôl.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Is everyone else alright? Is Violet...
dialogue.translation: Ydy pawb arall yn iawn? Ydy Violet...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine - she's back on the ship!
dialogue.translation: Mae hi'n iawn - mae hi nôl ar y llong!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh! Great - Let's get going, then!
dialogue.translation: O! Gwych - gad i ni fynd, felly!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! Captain! Are you stuck here too?
dialogue.translation: O na! Capten! Wyt ti'n sownd yma hefyd?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's ok - I'm here to rescue you!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n iawn - rydw i yma i dy achub di!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let me explain everything...
dialogue.translation: Gadewch imi egluro popeth ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? I didn't understand any of that!
dialogue.translation: Beth? Doeddwn i ddim yn deall dim o hynny!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... well, don't worry.
dialogue.translation: O... wel, peidiwch â phoeni.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! Everything will be alright!
dialogue.translation: Dilyna fi! Bydd popeth yn iawn!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Sniff... Really?
dialogue.translation: Sniffian... O ddifri?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Iawn te!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Am I ever glad to see you! I thought I was the only one to escape the ship...
dialogue.translation: Ydw i'n falch o dy weld di! Roeddwn i'n meddwl mai fi oedd yr unig un i ddianc o'r llong ...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion! I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Vermilion! Roeddwn i'n gwybod y byddet ti'n iawn!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: So, what's the situation?
dialogue.translation: Felly, beth yw'r sefyllfa?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I see! Well, we'd better get back then.
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n gweld! Wel, gwell i ni gyrraedd yn ôl te.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: There's a teleporter in the next room.
dialogue.translation: Mae teleporter yn yr ystafell nesaf.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, Viridian! You got off the ship alright too?
dialogue.translation: Ah, Viridian! Dest ti oddi ar y llong yn iawn hefyd?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's good to see you're alright, Professor!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n dda gweld eich bod yn iawn, Athro!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Is the ship ok?
dialogue.translation: Ydy'r llong yn iawn?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's badly damaged, but Violet's been working on fixing it.
dialogue.translation: Mae wedi'i ddifrodi'n ddrwg, ond mae Violet wedi bod yn gweithio i'w thrwsio.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We could really use your help...
dialogue.translation: Gallem wir ddefnyddio eich help...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, of course!
dialogue.translation: Ah, wrth gwrs!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: The background interference in this dimension prevented the ship from finding a teleporter when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Roedd yr ymyrraeth gefndirol yn y dimensiwn hwn yn atal y llong rhag dod o hyd i deleporter pan wnaethon ni grasio!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We've all been teleported to different locations!
dialogue.translation: Rydyn ni i gyd wedi cael ein teleportio i leoliadau gwahanol!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Er, that sounds about right!
dialogue.translation: Eh, mae hynny'n swnio'n iawn!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's get back to the ship, then!
dialogue.translation: Gadewch i ni fynd yn ôl at y llong, felly!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ar dy ôl di, Capten!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Waaaa !

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Are you ok?
dialogue.translation: Capten! Wyt ti'n iawn?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm ok... this... this isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n iawn... nid... nid dyma'r llong...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Ble ydyn ni?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Waaaa !

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Something's gone wrong... We should look for a way back!
dialogue.translation: Mae rhywbeth wedi mynd o'i le... Dylem chwilio am ffordd yn ôl!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! I'll help you!
dialogue.translation: Dilyna fi! Wnai dy helpu di!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Promise you won't leave without me!
dialogue.translation: Addo na fyddet ti'n gadael hebddai!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I promise! Don't worry!
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n addo! Peidiwch â phoeni!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you ok down there, Doctor?
dialogue.translation: Wyt ti'n iawn i lawr yna, Doctor?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wanna go home!
dialogue.translation: Dw i eisiau mynd adref!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Where are we? How did we even get here?
dialogue.translation: Ble ydyn ni? Sut wnaethon ni hyd yn oed gyrraedd yma?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Well, Violet did say that the interference in the dimension we crashed in was causing problems with the teleporters...
dialogue.translation: Wel, fe ddywedodd Violet fod yr ymyrraeth yn y dimensiwn y bu ni grasio ynddo yn achosi problemau gyda'r teleporters...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I guess something went wrong...
dialogue.translation: Mae'n debyg bod rhywbeth wedi mynd o'i le...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: But if we can find another teleporter, I think we can get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Ond os gallwn ddod o hyd i deleporter arall, rwy'n meddwl y gallwn gyrraedd yn ôl i'r llong!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Captain! Wait for me!
dialogue.translation: Capten! Capten! Arhoswch i mi!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Please don't leave me behind! I don't mean to be a burden!
dialogue.translation: Peidiwch â gadael fi ar ôl! Dydw i ddim yn ei olygu i fod yn faich!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm scared!
dialogue.translation: Mae ofn arna i!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... don't worry Victoria, I'll look after you!
dialogue.translation: O... paid â phoeni Victoria, mi fydda i'n edrych ar dy ôl di!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're never going to get out of here, are we?
dialogue.translation: Dydyn ni byth yn mynd i adael fan hyn, ydyn ni?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I.. I don't know...
dialogue.translation: Dw i ddim yn gwybod...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know where we are or how we're going to get out...
dialogue.translation: Dydw i ddim yn gwybod ble rydyn ni na sut rydyn ni'n mynd i adael ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're going to be lost forever!
dialogue.translation: Rydyn ni'n mynd i fod ar goll am byth!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok, come on... Things aren't that bad.
dialogue.translation: Iawn, dewch ymlaen... Dyw pethau ddim mor ddrwg â hynny.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I have a feeling that we're nearly home!
dialogue.translation: Mae gen i deimlad ein bod ni bron adref!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We can't be too far from another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Ni allwn fod yn rhy bell o deleporter arall!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope you're right, captain...
dialogue.translation: Gobeithio dy fod di'n iawn, capten...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! You were right! It's a teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Capten! Roeddet ti'n gywir! Mae'n deleporter!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Phew! You had me worried for a while there... I thought we were never going to find one.
dialogue.translation: Fffiw! Roeddet ti wedi fy mhoeni am ychydig yno... roeddwn i'n meddwl nad oedden ni byth yn mynd i ddod o hyd i un.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? Really?
dialogue.translation: Beth? Rili?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Anyway, let's go back to the ship.
dialogue.translation: Beth bynnag, gadewch i ni fynd yn ôl at y llong.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Huh? This isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Huh? Nid dyma'r llong...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! What's going on?
dialogue.translation: Capten! Beth sy'n Digwydd?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I... I don't know!
dialogue.translation: D... Dydw i ddim yn gwybod!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Ble ydyn ni?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Uh oh, this isn't good... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: O, dyw hyn ddim yn dda... Mae'n rhaid bod rhywbeth wedi mynd o'i le gyda'r teleporter!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok... no need to panic!
dialogue.translation: Iawn... dim angen mynd i banig!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's look for another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Edrychwn am deleporter arall!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go this way!
dialogue.translation: Gadewch i ni fynd y ffordd yma!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ar dy ôl di, Capten!

cutscene.explanation: just like in rescuegreen, `Violet is back on the ship` does not mean she was ever off the ship and has *returned* to it. Or maybe Verdigris thinks Violet was warped off the ship as well just like him and she *has* made her way back to the ship?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So Violet's back on the ship? She's really ok?
dialogue.translation: Felly mae Violet yn ôl ar y llong? Mae hi'n iawn, ie?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine! She helped me find my way back!
dialogue.translation: Mae hi'n iawn! Gwnaeth hi fy helpu dod o hyd i'm ffordd yn ôl!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh, phew! I was worried about her.
dialogue.translation: O, ffiw! Roeddwn i'n poeni amdani.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain, I have a secret...
dialogue.translation: Capten, mae gen i gyfrinach ...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I really like Violet!
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n hoff iawn o Violet!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is that so?
dialogue.translation: Ydy hynny'n wir?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Please promise you won't tell her!
dialogue.translation: Plis addo na fyddet ti'n dweud wrthi!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hey again!
dialogue.translation: Hei eto!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Wy ti'n iawn?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think so! I really hope we can find a way back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n credu! Rwy'n mawr obeithio y gallwn ddod o hyd i'r llong ...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So, about Violet...
dialogue.translation: Felly, am Violet...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um, yeah?
dialogue.translation: Ym, ie?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Do you have any advice?
dialogue.translation: Oes gen ti unrhyw gyngor?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um... you should... be yourself!
dialogue.translation: Um... dyle... di fod ti dy hun!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Thanks Captain!
dialogue.translation: Diolch Capten!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, do you think you'll be able to fix the ship?
dialogue.translation: Felly, wyt ti'n meddwl gallet ti drwsio'r llong?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Depends on how bad it is... I think so, though!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n dibynnu pa mor ddrwg yw e... Dwi'n meddwl, gallai!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It's not very hard, really. The basic dimensional warping engine design is pretty simple, and if we can get that working we shouldn't have any trouble getting home.
dialogue.translation: Nid yw'n anodd iawn, a dweud y gwir. Mae dyluniad sylfaenol yr injan dimensiwn warpio yn eithaf syml, ac os gallwn sicrhau bod hynny'n gweithio ni ddylem gael unrhyw drafferth i gyrraedd adref.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh! Good!
dialogue.translation: O! Da!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Finally! A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: O'r diwedd! Mae teleporter!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I was getting worried we wouldn't find one...
dialogue.translation: Roeddwn i'n poeni na fydden ni'n dod o hyd i un...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's head back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Gadewch i ni fynd yn ôl at y llong!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Wow! Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Waw! Ble ydyn ni?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This... isn't right... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Dyw hyn... ddim yn iawn... Mae'n rhaid bod rhywbeth wedi mynd o'i le gyda'r teleporter!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Oh well... We can work it out when we get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: O wel... gallwn ei weithio allan pan fyddwn yn cyrraedd yn ôl i'r llong!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's go exploring!
dialogue.translation: Gadewch i ni fynd i archwilio!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Iawn te!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Dilyna fi!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Aye aye, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ie ie , Capten!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Viridian... how did the crash happen, exactly?
dialogue.translation: Hei Viridian ... sut ddigwyddodd y crash, yn union?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh, I don't really know - some sort of interference...
dialogue.translation: O, dwi ddim yn gwybod - rhyw fath o ymyrraeth...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...or something sciencey like that. It's not really my area.
dialogue.translation: ...neu rywbeth gwyddonol fel 'na. Nid fy ardal i yw hi mewn gwirionedd.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Ah! Well, do you think we'll be able to fix the ship and go home?
dialogue.translation: Ah! Wel, wyt ti'n meddwl y byddwn ni'n gallu trwsio'r llong a mynd adref?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Of course! Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Wrth gwrs! Bydd popeth yn iawn!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hi again! You doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Helo eto! Ti'n iawn?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I think so! But I really want to get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n meddwl! Ond rydw i wir eisiau mynd yn ôl i'r llong ...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll be ok! If we can find a teleporter somewhere we should be able to get back!
dialogue.translation: Byddwn yn iawn! Os gallwn ddod o hyd i deleporter yn rhywle dylem allu cyrraedd yn ôl!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Are we there yet?
dialogue.translation: Ydym ni yna eto?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're getting closer, I think...
dialogue.translation: Rydym ni'n agoshau, dwi'n meddwl...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I hope...
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n gobeithio...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I wonder where we are, anyway?
dialogue.translation: Tybed ble ydym ni, beth bynnag?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This seems different from that dimension we crashed in, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Mae hyn yn ymddangos yn wahanol i'r dimensiwn hwnnw y gwnaethom grasio ynddo, rywsut...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I dunno... But we must be close to a teleporter by now...
dialogue.translation: Dwn i ddim ... Ond rhaid bod ni'n agos at deleporter erbyn hyn...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're there!
dialogue.translation: Rydym ni yma!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: See? I told you! Let's get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Gweld? Dwedais wrthyt ti! Dewch i ni fynd yn ôl at y llong!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oooh! This is interesting...
dialogue.translation: Www! Mae hyn yn ddiddorol...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you been here before?
dialogue.translation: Capten! Wyt ti wedi bod yma o'r blaen?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Beth? Ble ydyn ni?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I suspect something deflected our teleporter transmission! This is somewhere new...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n amau bod rhywbeth wedi gwyro trosglwyddiad ein teleporter! Dyma rywle newydd...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: O na!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We should try to find a teleporter and get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Dylem geisio dod o hyd i deleporter a mynd yn ôl i'r llong...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Dilyna fi!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Right behind you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Y tu ôl i ti, Capten!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What do you make of all this, Professor?
dialogue.translation: Beth wyt ti'n ei wneud o hyn i gyd, Athro?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm guessing this dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash!
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n dyfalu bod gan y dimensiwn hwn rywbeth i'w wneud â'r ymyrraeth a achosodd i ni grasio!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the cause of it here?
dialogue.translation: Efallai y byddwn yn dod o hyd i beth achosodd e yma?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh wow! Really?
dialogue.translation: O waw! Rili?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Well, it's just a guess. I'll need to get back to the ship before I can do any real tests...
dialogue.translation: Wel, dim ond dyfalu ydwyf. Bydd angen i mi fynd yn ôl i'r llong cyn y gallaf wneud unrhyw brofion go iawn ...

cutscene.explanation: the split paths merge, and Vitellary sees a checkpoint

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ohh! What was that?
dialogue.translation: O! Beth oedd hwnna?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What was what?
dialogue.translation: Beth oedd beth?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That big... C thing! I wonder what it does?
dialogue.translation: Y peth mawr... C hwnnw! Tybed beth mae'n ei wneud?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Em... I don't really know how to answer that question...
dialogue.translation: Em ... Dydw i ddim wir yn gwybod sut i ateb y cwestiwn hwnnw ...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's probably best not to acknowledge that it's there at all.
dialogue.translation: Mae'n debyg ei bod yn well peidio â chydnabod ei fod yno o gwbl.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we should take it back to the ship to study it?
dialogue.translation: Efallai y dylem fynd ag ef yn ôl i'r llong i'w astudio?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We really shouldn't think about it too much... Let's keep moving!
dialogue.translation: Ddylen ni ddim meddwl gormod amdano... Gad i ni ddal ati i symud!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: You know, there's something really odd about this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Wyddoch chi, mae rhywbeth rhyfedd iawn am y dimensiwn hwn...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We shouldn't really be able to move between dimensions with a regular teleporter...
dialogue.translation: Ni ddylem mewn gwirionedd allu symud rhwng dimensiynau gyda theleporter rheolaidd...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe this isn't a proper dimension at all?
dialogue.translation: Efallai nad yw hwn yn ddimensiwn iawn o gwbl?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe it's some kind of polar dimension? Something artificially created for some reason?
dialogue.translation: Efallai ei fod yn rhyw fath o ddimensiwn pegynol? Rhywbeth wedi'i greu'n artiffisial am ryw reswm?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I can't wait to get back to the ship. I have a lot of tests to run!
dialogue.translation: Dwi methu aros i fynd yn ôl at y llong. Mae gen i lawer o brofion i'w rhedeg!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder if there's anything else in this dimension worth exploring?
dialogue.translation: Tybed a oes unrhyw beth arall yn y dimensiwn hwn sy'n werth ei archwilio?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe... but we should probably just focus on finding the rest of the crew for now...
dialogue.translation: Efallai... ond mae'n debyg y dylem ganolbwyntio ar ddod o hyd i weddill y criw am y tro...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: At last!
dialogue.translation: O'r diwedd!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's go back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Gadewch i ni fynd yn ôl at y llong!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Uh o...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Ddim eto!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Victoria? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Victoria? Ble wyt ti?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Dal ymlaen! Wnâi dy achub di!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Verdigris? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Verdigris? Ble wyt ti?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.translation: Aaaghgh !

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Dal ymlaen! Wnâi dy achub di!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vermilion? Ble wyt ti?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Dal ymlaen! Wnâi dy achub di!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vitellary? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vitellary? Ble wyt ti?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Dal ymlaen! Wnâi dy achub di!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I think I'm going to be sick...
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n meddwl dwi'n mynd i fod yn sâl...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n teimlo'n benysgafn...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Phew! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Ffiw! Ti'n iawn!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n teimlo'n benysgafn...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Again! Let's go again!
dialogue.translation: Eto! Gadewch i ni fynd eto!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n teimlo'n benysgafn...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That was interesting, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Roedd hynny'n ddiddorol, ond doedd e?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n teimlo'n benysgafn...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... I hope Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: ... Gobeithio bod Verdigris yn iawn.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you can find him, he'd be a a big help fixing the ship!
dialogue.translation: Os gallet ti ddod o hyd iddo, byddai'n help mawr i drwsio'r llong!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris is so brave and ever so smart!
dialogue.translation: Mae Prif Verdigris mor ddewr a mor glyfar!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Croeso nôl, Capten!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think Victoria is quite happy to be back on the ship.
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n meddwl bod Victoria yn ddigon hapus i fod yn ôl ar y llong.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: She really doesn't like adventuring. She gets very homesick!
dialogue.translation: Nid yw hi wir yn hoffi antur. Mae hi'n mynd yn hiraethus iawn!

cutscene.explanation: only one of the last 6 strings is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Vermilion called in to say hello!
dialogue.translation: Galwodd Vermilion i mewn i ddweud helo!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych ymlaen yn fawr at eich helpu i ddod o hyd i weddill y criw!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Victoria!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych ymlaen yn fawr at eich helpu i ddod o hyd i Victoria!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vitellary!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych ymlaen yn fawr at eich helpu i ddod o hyd i Vitallary!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych ymlaen yn fawr at eich helpu i ddod o hyd i Verdigris!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vermilion!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych ymlaen yn fawr at eich helpu i ddod o hyd i Vermilion!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find you!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych ymlaen yn fawr at eich helpu i ddod o hyd i chi!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You found Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Capten! Fe ddest ti o hyd i Verdigris!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Thank you so much!
dialogue.translation: Diolch yn fawr iawn!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm glad Professor Vitellary is ok!
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n falch bod yr Athro Vitellary yn iawn!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He had lots of questions for me about this dimension.
dialogue.translation: Roedd ganddo lawer o gwestiynau i mi am y dimensiwn hwn.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's already gotten to work with his research!
dialogue.translation: Mae eisoes wedi mynd i weithio gyda'i ymchwil!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange happened when we teleported back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Doctor, digwyddodd rhywbeth rhyfedd pan wnaethon ni deleportio yn ôl i'r llong ...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We got lost in another dimension!
dialogue.translation: Aethon ni ar goll mewn dimensiwn arall!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: O na!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Efallai bod gan y dimensiwn hwnnw rywbeth i'w wneud â'r ymyrraeth a achosodd i ni grasio yma?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll look into it...
dialogue.translation: Edrychaf i mewn iddo ...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor! Doctor! It happened again!
dialogue.translation: Meddyg! Meddyg! Digwyddodd e eto!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The teleporter brought us to that weird dimension...
dialogue.translation: Daeth y teleporter â ni i'r dimensiwn rhyfedd hwnnw ...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hmm, yn bendant mae rhywbeth rhyfedd yn digwydd...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Pe baem ond yn gallu dod o hyd i ffynhonnell yr ymyrraeth!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange has been happening when we teleport back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Doctor, mae rhywbeth rhyfedd wedi bod yn digwydd pan teleportio'n ni yn ôl i'r llong ...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We keep getting brought to another weird dimension!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n cymryd ni i ddimensiwn rhyfedd arall eto!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: O na!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Efallai bod gan y dimensiwn hwnnw rywbeth i'w wneud â'r ymyrraeth a achosodd i ni grasio yma?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hmm, yn bendant mae rhywbeth rhyfedd yn digwydd...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Pe baem ond yn gallu dod o hyd i ffynhonnell yr ymyrraeth!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hey Captain! Now that you've turned off the source of the interference, we can warp everyone back to the ship instantly, if we need to!
dialogue.translation: Hei Capten! Nawr eich bod wedi diffodd ffynhonnell yr ymyrraeth, os oes angen, gallwn teleportio pawb yn ôl i'r llong ar unwaith!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Any time you want to come back to the ship, just select the new SHIP option in your menu!
dialogue.translation: Unrhyw bryd rydych chi am ddod yn ôl i'r llong, dewiswch yr opsiwn LLONG newydd yn eich dewislen!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm an engineer!
dialogue.translation: Peiriannydd ydw i!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think I can get this ship moving again, but it's going to take a while...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n credu y gallai gael y llong hon i symud eto, ond mae'n mynd i gymryd ychydig o amser ...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Victoria mentioned something about a lab? I wonder if she found anything down there?
dialogue.translation: Soniodd Victoria rywbeth am labordy? Tybed a ddaeth hi o hyd i unrhyw beth i lawr yno?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Vermilion's back! Yey!
dialogue.translation: Mae Vermilion yn ôl! Hwre!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The Professor had lots of questions about this dimension for me...
dialogue.translation: Roedd gan yr Athro lawer o gwestiynau am y dimensiwn hwn i mi...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: We still don't really know that much, though.
dialogue.translation: Fodd bynnag, nid ydym yn gwybod cymaint â hynny mewn gwirionedd.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Until we work out what's causing that interference, we can't go anywhere.
dialogue.translation: Hyd nes y byddwn yn gweithio allan beth sy'n achosi'r ymyrraeth, ni allwn fynd i unrhyw le.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm so glad that Violet's alright!
dialogue.translation: Dwi mor falch bod Violet yn iawn!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: That other dimension we ended up in must be related to this one, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Mae'n rhaid i'r dimensiwn arall y daethom i ben ynddo fod yn gysylltiedig â'r un hwn, rywsut ...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The antenna's broken! This is going to be very hard to fix...
dialogue.translation: Mae'r antena wedi torri! Mae'n mynd i fod yn anodd iawn i'w drwsio...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It looks like we were warped into solid rock when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych fel ein bod ni wedi warpio i mewn i graig solid pan wnaethon ni grasio!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hmm. It's going to be hard to separate from this...
dialogue.translation: Hmm. Mae'n mynd i fod yn anodd gwahanu oddi wrth hyn...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The ship's all fixed up. We can leave at a moment's notice!
dialogue.translation: Mae'r llong i gyd wedi trwsio. Gallwn adael ar ennyd o rybudd!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Don't worry, Sir!
dialogue.translation: Paid â phoeni, Syr!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll find a way out of here!
dialogue.translation: Fe gawn ni hyd i ffordd allan o fan hyn!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I hope Victoria is ok...
dialogue.translation: Gobeithio bod Victoria yn iawn...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She doesn't handle surprises very well...
dialogue.translation: Nid yw hi'n delio â syrpreisys yn dda iawn ...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I don't know how we're going to get this ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Wn i ddim sut rydyn ni'n mynd i gael y llong hon i weithio eto!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris would know what to do...
dialogue.translation: Byddai'r Prif Verdigris yn gwybod beth i'w wneud...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the ship to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Tybed beth achosodd y llong i grasio yma?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's the shame the Professor isn't here, huh? I'm sure he could work it out!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n drueni nad yw'r Athro yma, huh? Rwy'n siŵr y gallai ei weithio allan!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's great to be back!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n wych bod yn ôl!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I can't wait to help you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Ni allaf aros i dy helpu i ddod o hyd i weddill y criw!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It'll be like old times, huh, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Bydd e fel yr hen ddyddiau, huh, Capten?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's good to have Victoria back with us.
dialogue.translation: Mae'n dda cael Victoria yn ôl gyda ni.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She really seems happy to get back to work in her lab!
dialogue.translation: Mae hi'n ymddangos yn hapus iawn i ddychwelyd i'r gwaith yn ei labordy!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I think I saw Verdigris working on the outside of the ship!
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n meddwl i mi weld Verdigris yn gweithio ar y tu allan i'r llong!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: You found Professor Vitellary! All right!
dialogue.translation: Daethoch o hyd i'r Athro Vitallary! Iawn!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll have this interference thing worked out in no time now!
dialogue.translation: Bydd y peth ymyrraeth hwn wedi'i weithio allan mewn dim amser o gwbl nawr!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: That other dimension was really strange, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Roedd y dimensiwn arall hwnnw'n rhyfedd iawn, ond doedd e?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the teleporter to send us there?
dialogue.translation: Tybed beth achosodd i'r teleporter ein hanfon yno?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Heia Capten!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This way looks a little dangerous...
dialogue.translation: Mae'r ffordd hon yn edrych ychydig yn beryglus ...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I'm helping!
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n helpu!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Captain!
dialogue.translation: Hei Capten!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I found something interesting around here - the same warp signature I saw when I landed!
dialogue.translation: Wnes i ffeindio rhywbeth diddorol o gwmpas fan hyn - yr un llofnod warpio a welais wrth lanio!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Someone from the ship must be nearby...
dialogue.translation: Rhaid bod rhywun o'r llong gerllaw...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This dimension is pretty exciting, isn't it?
dialogue.translation: Mae'r dimensiwn hwn yn eithaf cyffrous , ond dyw e?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Tybed beth gawn ni ddarganfod?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any signs of Professor Vitellary?
dialogue.translation: A oes unrhyw arwyddion o'r Athro Vitallary ?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, not yet...
dialogue.translation: Sori, ddim eto...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope he's ok...
dialogue.translation: Dwi'n gobeithio ei fod yn iawn ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thanks so much for saving me, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Diolch yn fawr am fy achub, Capten!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm so glad to be back!
dialogue.translation: Dwi mor falch o fod yn ôl!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: That lab was so dark and scary! I didn't like it at all...
dialogue.translation: Roedd y labordy hwnnw mor dywyll a brawychus! Doeddwn i ddim yn ei hoffi o gwbl ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Vitellary's back? I knew you'd find him!
dialogue.translation: Mae Vitallary yn ôl ? Roeddwn i'n gwybod y byddet ti'n dod o hyd iddo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I mean, I admit I was very worried that you wouldn't...
dialogue.translation: Hynny yw, rwy'n cyfaddef fy mod yn poeni'n fawr na fyddet ti'n ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: or that something might have happened to him...
dialogue.translation: neu y gallai rhywbeth fod wedi digwydd iddo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor Victoria? He's ok!
dialogue.translation: Doctor Victoria? Mae e'n iawn!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh! Sorry! I was just thinking about what if he wasn't?
dialogue.translation: O! Sori! Roeddwn i'n meddwl beth os nad oedd e?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thank you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Diolch, Capten!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You found Vermilion! Great!
dialogue.translation: Fe ddest ti o hyd i Vermilion! Gwych!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wish he wasn't so reckless!
dialogue.translation: Hoffwn pe na bai mor ddi-hid!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: He'll get himself into trouble...
dialogue.translation: Bydd e'n cael ei hun mewn trwbl...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Verdigris is ok! Violet will be so happy!
dialogue.translation: Mae Verdigris yn iawn! Bydd Violet mor hapus!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm happy!
dialogue.translation: Rydw i'n hapus!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Though I was very worried...
dialogue.translation: Er fy mod i'n bryderus iawn ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Why did the teleporter send us to that scary dimension?
dialogue.translation: Pam anfonodd y teleporter ni at y dimensiwn brawychus hwnnw?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What happened?
dialogue.translation: Beth ddigwyddodd?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know, Doctor...
dialogue.translation: Dydw i ddim yn gwybod, Doctor...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Heia Capten!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Are you going to try and find the rest of these shiny things?
dialogue.translation: Wyt ti'n mynd i geisio dod o hyd i weddill y pethau sgleiniog?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Hey Captain, I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Hei Capten, des i o hyd i hwn yn y labordy hwnnw ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Unrhyw syniad beth mae'n ei wneud?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Sori, dwi ddim yn gwybod!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: They seem important, though...
dialogue.translation: Mae'n ymddangos yn bwysig, er ...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe something will happen if we find them all?
dialogue.translation: Efallai y bydd rhywbeth yn digwydd os byddwn yn dod o hyd i nhw i gyd?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Capten! Dewch i gael golwg ar yr hyn rydw i wedi bod yn gweithio arno!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It looks like these shiny things are giving off a strange energy reading!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych fel bod y pethau sgleiniog hyn yn rhoi darlleniad egni rhyfedd!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Felly dadansoddais ef ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Capten! Dewch i gael golwg ar yr hyn rydw i wedi bod yn gweithio arno!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Cefais hyd i hwn yn y labordy hwnnw ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It seemed to be giving off a weird energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Roedd yn ymddangos ei fod yn rhoi darlleniad egni rhyfedd ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Felly dadansoddais ef ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and I was able to find more of them with the ship's scanner!
dialogue.translation: ...a llwyddais i ddod o hyd i fwy ohonyn nhw gyda sganiwr y llong!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: If you get a chance, it might be worth finding the rest of them!
dialogue.translation: Os gei di gyfle, efallai y byddai'n werth dod o hyd i'r gweddill ohonyn nhw!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Don't put yourself in any danger, though!
dialogue.translation: Peidiwch â rhoi eich hun mewn unrhyw berygl, serch hynny!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...but it looks like you've already found all of them in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: ...ond mae'n edrych fel eich bod wedi dod o hyd i bob un ohonyn nhw yn y dimensiwn hwn yn barod!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: O? Rili?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah, well done! That can't have been easy!
dialogue.translation: Ie, da iawn! Ni all hynny fod wedi bod yn hawdd!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and they're related. They're all a part of something bigger!
dialogue.translation: ...ac maen nhw'n perthyn. Maen nhw i gyd yn rhan o rywbeth mwy!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: O? Rili?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah! There seem to be twenty variations of the fundamental energy signature...
dialogue.translation: Ydw! Mae'n ymddangos bod ugain amrywiad o'r llofnod ynni sylfaenol...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Does that mean you've found all of them?
dialogue.translation: A yw hynny'n golygu eich bod wedi dod o hyd i bob un ohonyn nhw?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm making some fascinating discoveries, captain!
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n gwneud rhai darganfyddiadau hynod ddiddorol, capten!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This isn't like any other dimension we've been to, Captain.
dialogue.translation: Nid yw hyn yn debyg i unrhyw ddimensiwn arall yr ydym wedi bod iddo, Capten.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something strange about this place...
dialogue.translation: Mae rhywbeth rhyfedd am y lle yma...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain, have you noticed that this dimension seems to wrap around?
dialogue.translation: Capten, wyt ti wedi sylwi ei bod yn ymddangos bod y dimensiwn hwn yn amlapio?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it's strange...
dialogue.translation: Ydy, mae'n rhyfedd ...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like this dimension is having the same stability problems as our own!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych fel bod y dimensiwn hwn yn cael yr un problemau sefydlogrwydd â'n rhai ni!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope we're not the ones causing it...
dialogue.translation: Gobeithio nad ni yw'r rhai sy'n ei achosi...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Do you think we might be?
dialogue.translation: Beth? Wyt ti'n meddwl efallai ein bod ni?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: No no... that's very unlikely, really...
dialogue.translation: Na na ... mae hynny'n annhebygol iawn, a dweud y gwir...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: My guess is that whoever used to live here was experimenting with ways to stop the dimension from collapsing.
dialogue.translation: Fy nyfaliad yw bod pwy bynnag oedd arfer byw yma yn arbrofi gyda ffyrdd i atal y dimensiwn rhag cwympo.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It would explain why they've wrapped the edges...
dialogue.translation: Byddai'n esbonio pam maen nhw wedi lapio'r ymylon ...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Hey, maybe that's what's causing the interference?
dialogue.translation: Hei, efallai mai dyna sy'n achosi'r ymyrraeth?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder where the people who used to live here have gone?
dialogue.translation: Tybed i ble mae'r bobl oedd yn arfer byw yma wedi mynd?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think it's no coincidence that the teleporter was drawn to that dimension...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n credu nad yw'n gyd-ddigwyddiad bod y teleporter wedi'i dynnu at y dimensiwn hwnnw ...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something there. I think it might be causing the interference that's stopping us from leaving...
dialogue.translation: Mae rhywbeth yno. Rwy'n meddwl y gallai fod yn achosi'r ymyrraeth sy'n ein hatal rhag gadael...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm glad Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n falch bod Verdigris yn iawn.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It'll be a lot easier to find some way out of here now that we can get the ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Bydd yn llawer haws dod o hyd i ffordd allan o fan hyn nawr y gallwn gael y llong i weithio eto!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, you've found Doctor Victoria? Excellent!
dialogue.translation: Ah, rwyt ti wedi dod o hyd i Doctor Victoria? Ardderchog!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I have lots of questions for her!
dialogue.translation: Mae gen i lawer o gwestiynau iddi!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Vermilion says that he was trapped in some sort of tunnel?
dialogue.translation: Mae Vermilion yn dweud ei fod wedi'i drapio mewn rhyw fath o dwnnel?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it just seemed to keep going and going...
dialogue.translation: Ie, roedd fel petai'n dal ati i barhau...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Interesting... I wonder why it was built?
dialogue.translation: Diddorol... Tybed pam y cafodd ei adeiladu?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's good to be back!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n dda bod yn ôl!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've got so much work to catch up on...
dialogue.translation: Mae gen i gymaint o waith i ddal i fyny arno...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I know it's probably a little dangerous to stay here now that this dimension is collapsing...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n gwybod ei bod hi'n ychydig yn beryglus aros yma nawr bod y dimensiwn hwn yn cwympo ...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...but it's so rare to find somewhere this interesting!
dialogue.translation: ...ond mae hi mor brin dod o hyd i rywle mor ddiddorol!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the answers to our own problems here?
dialogue.translation: Efallai y byddwn yn dod o hyd i'r atebion i'n problemau ein hunain yma?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been meaning to give this to you...
dialogue.translation: Capten! Rydw i wedi bod yn bwriadu rhoi hwn i ti ...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Professor! Where did you find this?
dialogue.translation: Athro! Ble dest ti o hyd i hwn?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh, it was just lying around that space station.
dialogue.translation: O, dim ond gorwedd o gwmpas yr orsaf ofod honno oedd hi.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's a pity Doctor Victoria isn't here, she loves studying that sort of thing...
dialogue.translation: Mae'n drueni nad yw Doctor Victoria yma, mae hi wrth ei bodd yn astudio'r math yna o beth...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Unrhyw syniad beth mae'n ei wneud?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Nope! But it is giving off a strange energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Na! Ond mae'n rhoi darlleniad egni rhyfedd ...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...so I used the ship's scanner to find more of them!
dialogue.translation: ... felly defnyddiais i sganiwr y llong i ffeindio mwy ohonyn nhw!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...Please don't let them distract you from finding Victoria, though!
dialogue.translation: ...Peidiwch â gadael iddyn nhw dynnu eich sylw rhag dod o hyd i Victoria!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Gobeithio ei bod hi'n iawn...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Can't seem to detect any more of them nearby, though.
dialogue.translation: Fodd bynnag, nid yw'n ymddangos fel pe bai'n canfod mwy ohonyn nhw gerllaw.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe you've found them all?
dialogue.translation: Efallai eich bod wedi dod o hyd iddyn nhw i gyd?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back!
dialogue.translation: Croeso nôl!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Um, where's Captain Viridian?
dialogue.translation: Um, ble mae Capten Viridian?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ... Hello?
dialogue.translation: ... Helo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is anyone there?
dialogue.translation: Oes unrhywun yna?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
* DIMENSIONAL STABILITY GENERATOR *
[ Currently Generating ] Maximum Stability
[ Status ] Online
READY _
dialogue.translation:
* GENERYDD SEFYDLOGRWYDD DIMENSIWN *
[ Cynhyrchu ar hyn o bryd ] Sefydlogrwydd Uchaf
[ Statws ] Ar-lein
BAROD _

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Aha! This must be what's causing the interference!
dialogue.translation: Aha! Mae'n rhaid mai dyma sy'n achosi'r ymyrraeth!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder if I can turn it off?
dialogue.translation: Tybed a allai ei ddiffodd?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: WARNING: Disabling the Dimensional Stability Generator may lead to instability! Are you sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation: RHYBUDD: Gall analluogi'r Cynhyrchydd Sefydlogrwydd Dimensiwn arwain at ansefydlogrwydd! Wyt ti'n siŵr eich bod am wneud hyn?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
Seriously! The whole dimension could collapse! Just think about this for a minute!
Are you really sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation:
O ddifrif! Gallai'r dimensiwn cyfan ddymchwel! Meddyliwch am hyn am funud!
Ydych chi'n siŵr eich bod chi am wneud hyn?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
DIMENSIONAL STABILISER OFFLINE
dialogue.translation:
-= RHYBUDD =-
SEFYDLOGWR DIMENSIWN ALLANOL

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Uh o...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Any moment now...
dialogue.translation: Unrhyw eiliad nawr...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You're alright!
dialogue.translation: Ti'n iawn!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Roeddwn i'n gwybod y byddet ti'n iawn!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We were very worried when you didn't come back...
dialogue.translation: Roeddem yn bryderus iawn pan na ddest ti yn ôl...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: ...but when you turned off the source of the interference...
dialogue.translation: ...ond pan wnest ti ddiffodd ffynhonnell yr ymyrraeth...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...we were able to find you with the ship's scanners...
dialogue.translation: ...roeddem yn gallu dod o hyd i chi gyda sganwyr y llong...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...and teleport you back on board!
dialogue.translation: ...a'ch teleportio yn ôl ar fwrdd y llong!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That was lucky!
dialogue.translation: Roedd hynny'n lwcus!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Thanks guys!
dialogue.translation: Diolch bois!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...it looks like this dimension is starting to destabilise, just like our own...
dialogue.translation: ...mae'n edrych fel bod y dimensiwn hwn yn dechrau ansefydlogi, yn union fel ein dimensiwn ni...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...we can stay and explore for a little longer, but...
dialogue.translation: ...gallwn aros ac archwilio am ychydig yn hirach, ond...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...eventually, it'll collapse completely.
dialogue.translation: ...yn y pen draw, bydd yn cwympo'n llwyr.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: There's no telling exactly how long we have here. But the ship's fixed, so...
dialogue.translation: Does dim dweud yn union pa mor hir sydd gennym ni yma. Ond mae'r llong yn sefydlog, felly ...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...as soon as we're ready, we can go home!
dialogue.translation: ...cyn gynted ag y byddwn yn barod, gallwn fynd adref!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What now, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Beth nawr, Capten?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's find a way to save this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Dewch i ni ddod o hyd o ffordd i arbed y dimensiwn hwn!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: And a way to save our home dimension too!
dialogue.translation: A ffordd i achub ein dimensiwn cartref hefyd!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The answer is out there, somewhere!
dialogue.translation: Mae'r ateb allan yna, yn rhywle!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!
dialogue.translation: Awn ni!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Wow! You found all of them!
dialogue.translation: Waw! Fe ddaethoch chi o hyd iddyn nhw i gyd!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Really? Great!
dialogue.translation: Rili? Gwych!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'll run some tests and see if I can work out what they're for...
dialogue.translation: Byddaf yn cynnal rhai profion a gweld a allaf weithio allan beth yw eu pwrpas...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That... that didn't sound good...
dialogue.translation: Doedd... doedd hynny ddim yn swnio'n dda...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: O na!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Ddim eto!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Wait! It's stopped!
dialogue.translation: Arhoswch! Mae wedi stopio!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: This is where we were storing those shiny things? What happened?
dialogue.translation: Dyma lle roedden ni'n storio'r pethau sgleiniog yna? Beth ddigwyddodd?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We were just playing with them, and...
dialogue.translation: Roedden ni jyst yn chwarae gyda nhw, a...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...they suddenly exploded!
dialogue.translation: ...ffrwydron nhw'n sydyn!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: But look what they made! Is that a teleporter?
dialogue.translation: Ond edrych beth wnaethon nhw! Ai teleporter yw hwnna?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think so, but...
dialogue.translation: Rwy'n meddwl, ond ...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've never seen a teleporter like that before...
dialogue.translation: Dwi erioed wedi gweld teleporter fel yna o'r blaen...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We should investigate!
dialogue.translation: Dylem ymchwilio!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What do you think, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Beth yw eich barn chi, Capten?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Should we find out where it leads?
dialogue.translation: A ddylem ni ddarganfod i ble mae'n arwain?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!
dialogue.translation: Awn ni!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! We're trapped!
dialogue.translation: O na! Ni wedi'u trapio!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh dear...
dialogue.translation: O diar...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hmm... how should we get out of this?
dialogue.translation: Hmm... sut dylen ni ddod allan o hyn?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Or, you know... we could have just warped back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Neu, wyddoch chi... gallem fod wedi camu yn ôl i'r llong...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Wow! What is this?
dialogue.translation: Waw! Beth yw hwn?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like another laboratory!
dialogue.translation: Mae'n edrych fel labordy arall!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's have a look around!
dialogue.translation: Gad i ni edrych o gwmpas!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look at all this research! This is going to be a big help back home!
dialogue.translation: Edrychwch ar yr holl ymchwil hwn! Mae hyn yn mynd i fod yn help mawr yn ôl adref!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I wonder why they abandoned this dimension? They were so close to working out how to fix it...
dialogue.translation: Tybed pam wnaethom nhw rhoi'r gorau ar y dimensiwn hwn? Roedden nhw mor agos at weithio allan sut i'w drwsio...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Maybe we can fix it for them? Maybe they'll come back?
dialogue.translation: Efallai y gallwn ei drwsio ar eu cyfer? Efallai y bydden nhw'n dod yn ôl?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: This lab is amazing! The scientists who worked here know a lot more about warp technology than we do!
dialogue.translation: Mae'r labordy hwn yn anhygoel! Mae'r gwyddonwyr a fu'n gweithio yma yn gwybod llawer mwy am dechnoleg warpio na ni!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you seen this?
dialogue.translation: Capten! Wyt ti wedi gweld hwn?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: With their research and ours, we should be able to stabilise our own dimension!
dialogue.translation: Gyda'u hymchwil nhw a'n hymchwil ni, dylem allu sefydlogi ein dimensiwn ein hunain!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We're saved!
dialogue.translation: Rydyn ni'n cael ein hachub!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Look what I found!
dialogue.translation: Edrych beth wnes i ddarganfod!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's pretty hard, I can only last for about 10 seconds...
dialogue.translation: Mae'n eithaf anodd , dim ond am tua 10 eiliad y gallaf bara ...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= JUKEBOX =-
Songs will continue to play until you leave the ship.
Collect trinkets to unlock new songs!
dialogue.translation: -= JIWCBOCS =- Bydd caneuon yn parhau i chwarae nes i chi adael y llong. Casglwch dlysau i ddatgloi caneuon newydd!

dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 5 Trinkets
Pushing Onwards
dialogue.translation:
DATGLOI NESAF:
5 Tlysau
Pushing Onwards

dialogue.english:

dialogue.translation:
DATGLOI NESAF:
8 Tlysau
Positive Force

Presenting VVVVVV
dialogue.translation:
DATGLOI NESAF:
10 Tlysau
Presenting VVVVVV

Potential for Anything
dialogue.translation:
DATGLOI NESAF:
12 Tlysau
Potensial ar gyfer Unrhyw beth

dialogue.translation:

14 Tlysau
Pressure Cooker

dialogue.translation:

dialogue.translation:
