dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= LOG PERSONOL =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Almost everyone has been evacuated from the space station now. The rest of us are leaving in a couple of days, once our research has been completed.
dialogue.translation: Mae bron pawb wedi cael eu gwacau o'r orsaf ofod nawr. Mae'r gweddill ohonom yn gadael mewn cwpl o ddiwrnodau, unwaith y bydd ein hymchwil wedi'i chwblhau.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nodiadau Ymchwil =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...everything collapses, eventually. It's the way of the universe.
dialogue.translation: ...mae popeth yn cwympo, yn y pen draw. Dyna ffordd y bydysawd.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I wonder if the generator we set up in the polar dimension is what's affecting our teleporters?
dialogue.translation: Tybed ai'r generadur a sefydlwyd gennym yn y dimensiwn pegynol yw'r hyn sy'n effeithio ar ein teleporters?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: No, it's probably just a glitch.
dialogue.translation: Na, mae'n debyg mai dim ond glitch yw e.

cutscene.explanation: a trinket that's difficult to get

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= LOG PERSONOL =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Hah! Nobody will ever get this one.
dialogue.translation: Hah! Ni fydd neb byth yn cael yr un hyn.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...The other day I was chased down a hallway by a giant cube with the word AVOID on it.
dialogue.translation: ...Y diwrnod o'r blaen cefais fy erlid i lawr cyntedd gan giwb anferth gyda'r gair OSGOI arno.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: These security measures go too far!
dialogue.translation: Mae'r mesurau diogelwch hyn yn mynd yn rhy bell!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: The only way into my private lab anymore is by teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Yr unig ffordd i mewn i'm labordy preifat bellach yw trwy deleporter.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've made sure that it's difficult for unauthorised personnel to gain access.
dialogue.translation: Rwyf wedi gwneud yn siŵr ei bod yn anodd i bersonel anawdurdodedig gael mynediad.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nodiadau Ymchwil =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... our first breakthrough was the creation of the inversion plane, which creates a mirrored dimension beyond a given event horizon ...
dialogue.translation: ... ein datblygiad arloesol cyntaf oedd creu'r awyren wrthdroad, sy'n creu dimensiwn a adlewyrchir y tu hwnt i orwel digwyddiad penodol ...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nodiadau Ymchwil =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...with just a small modification to the usual parameters, we were able to stabilise an infinite tunnel!
dialogue.translation: ...gyda dim ond addasiad bach i'r paramedrau arferol, roeddem yn gallu sefydlogi twnnel anfeidrol!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nodiadau Ymchwil =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... the final step in creating the dimensional stabiliser was to create a feedback loop ...
dialogue.translation: ... y cam olaf wrth greu'r sefydlogwr dimensiwn oedd creu dolen adborth ...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nodiadau Ymchwil =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...despite our best efforts, the dimensional stabiliser won't hold out forever. Its collapse is inevitable...
dialogue.translation: ...er gwaethaf ein hymdrechion gorau, ni fydd y sefydlogwr dimensiwn yn para am byth. Mae ei gwymp yn anochel...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Huh? These coordinates aren't even in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Huh? Nid yw'r cyfesurynnau hyn hyd yn oed yn y dimensiwn hwn!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Personal Log =-
dialogue.translation: -= Log Personol =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... I've had to seal off access to most of our research. Who knows what could happen if it fell into the wrong hands? ...
dialogue.translation: ... Rwyf wedi gorfod atal mynediad i'r rhan fwyaf o'n hymchwil. Pwy a ŵyr beth allai ddigwydd pe bai'n syrthio i'r dwylo anghywir? ...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nodiadau Ymchwil =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... access to the control center is still possible through the main atmospheric filters ...
dialogue.translation: ...ganolfan reoli yn dal yn bosibl trwy'r prif hidlwyr atmosfferig ...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... it turns out the key to stabilising this dimension was to create a balancing force outside of it!
dialogue.translation: ... mae'n troi allan mai'r allwedd i sefydlogi'r dimensiwn hwn oedd creu grym cydbwyso y tu allan iddo!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Though it looks like that's just a temporary solution, at best.
dialogue.translation: Er ei bod yn edrych fel mai ateb dros dro yn unig yw hwn, ar y gorau.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've been working on something more permanent, but it seems it's going to be too late...
dialogue.translation: Rydw i wedi bod yn gweithio ar rywbeth mwy parhaol, ond mae'n ymddangos y bydd hi'n rhy hwyr ...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ?SYNTAX ERROR
dialogue.translation: ? GWALL SYNTAX

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Now that the ship is fixed, we can leave anytime we want!
dialogue.translation: Nawr bod y llong yn sefydlog, gallwn adael unrhyw bryd y dymunwn!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We've all agreed to keep exploring this dimension, though.
dialogue.translation: Fodd bynnag, rydym i gyd wedi cytuno i barhau i archwilio'r dimensiwn hwn.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Who knows what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Pwy a wyr beth gawn ni ddarganfod?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= SHIP RADIO =-
[ Status ] Broadcasting
dialogue.translation:
-= RADIO LLONG =-
[ Statws ] Darlledu

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
The Super-Gravitron is intended for entertainment purposes only.
dialogue.translation:
-= RHYBUDD =-
Mae'r Disgyrchatron-Swper ar gyfer adloniant yn unig.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Anyone found using the Super Gravitron for educational purposes may be asked to stand in the naughty corner.
dialogue.translation: Gellir gofyn i unrhyw un a ganfyddir yn defnyddio'r Disgyrchatron Swper at ddibenion addysgol i sefyll yn y gornel ddrwg.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Ship Navigation Controls
dialogue.translation:
-= DSS SOULEYE =-
Rheolyddion Mordwyo Llong

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Error! Error! Cannot isolate dimensional coordinates! Interference detected!
dialogue.translation: Gwall! Gwall! Methu ynysu cyfesurynnau dimensiwn! Ymyrraeth wedi'i ganfod!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: ...oh, I've already found this.
dialogue.translation: ...o, dwi wedi ffeindio hwn yn barod.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Please disable invincibility and/or slowdown before entering the Super Gravitron.
dialogue.translation: Analluoga anorchfygolrwydd a/neu arafu cyn mynd i mewn i'r Disgyrchatron Swper.
